item.title: a web thought
item.description: The web has changed but there remain remnants of what it once was in terms of personal sites. I track some of those remnants, curating such sites (which are still active, or when Iâ€™m lucky, new), hoping to somehow keep my original vision of the web intact. Itâ€™s a tough road to drive on but Iâ€™ve got a decent set of wheels with a few bells and whistles and more important, I enjoy the driving.
